attributes.action: Keep clothing stores open for essential clothing with safe measures taken.
attributes.additional_details: Change the rules to keep main clothing stores open during lockdown with safety measures in place so people can still buy essential clothing for themselves, family and the vulnerable!
attributes.background: Clothes have been marked as non essential items therefore main clothing stores are closing for lockdown yet alcohol and chocolate are marked as essential. Clothes are more important then any alcohol! Especially with winter coming in fast and no one can get proper winter clothing!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Since you started your petition the national lockdown in England has ended. You could start a petition calling for changes to restrictions under the new local tier system, if there are specific changes you'd like to see made.
